description: I make pasta alla Norma all the time; you will find more than one recipe from me on the classic tomato and eggplant sauce But this is my favorite version, created on the spur of the moment and at the suggestion from a friend.
title: Pasta Alla Norma, My Way
title_page: Pasta Alla Norma, My Way Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
I make pasta alla Norma all the time; you will find more than one recipe from me on the classic tomato and eggplant sauce. But this is my favorite version, created on the spur of the moment and at the suggestion from a friend.
Featured in: A Twist Adds Complexity To A Pasta Dish.
Learn: How to Make Pasta
